rows.label: tev001291_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, hey, [ST:playername ]-san!
Are you here to test some new weapon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just wondering if I could maybe improve
the flight pack's intake bypass...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0003
rows.name:
I was just wondering if I could make the flight pack's
energy performance more efficient...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0004
rows.name:
I was just hearing all sorts of thing from
one of the Arms Company mechanics![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0005
rows.name:
As expected, hearing from people involved
in frontline weapon development
is amazing, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's surprising how much NLA technology advances
even while we're out on BLADE missions![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if she'd prefer to focus on being a mechanic.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if it wouldn't be better for her to focus on missions.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sure, sometimes I feel envious of
people who get to work with the latest
technology on the front lines, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0008
rows.name: BLADE work helps with development too, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0009
rows.name:
For example[ST:wide ]â€”
the other day during a mission, I spotted an
auravis flying way up in the sky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0010
rows.name:
When I was watching its
gliding posture really closely... I got an idea
for a new tail assembly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0011
rows.name:
At that moment, I was a little moved, thinking,
"I'm glad I'm a BLADE!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0012
rows.name:
...[ST:playername ]-san,
thanks for worrying about me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0013
rows.name:
I intend to do it so it doesn't interfere
with missions, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0014
rows.name:
Does it really look like
I'm not focused?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0015
rows.name:
Hmm... I'll be careful from now on...
If I'm not consciously trying not to, inevitably,
even when I'm fighting native creatures...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0016
rows.name:
The way their bodies move,
their structure... I can't help thinking,
"Could I apply that to a Doll?"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0017
rows.name:
Thanks for always honestly pointing out
my shortcomings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0018
rows.name:
The reason I can continue development even now
is because Elma-san and you, [ST:playername ]-san
are always helping me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0031
rows.name: Pat her head, saying it's thanks to her hard work.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0040
rows.name: Point Out

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0041
rows.name: Point out that she forgot Doug.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ehehe... [ST:playername ]-san,
you're kind of like a father...
Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ehehe...... [ST:playername ]-san,
you're somehow like a mother......
Thank you very much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0021
rows.name:
I want to work much, much harder
and make lots of machines
that will help everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0022
rows.name:
The other day, there was that accident where
the booster engine blew up big time, but...
I absolutely won't give up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0023
rows.name:
So, [ST:playername ]-san, you too,
please join me on experiments
as a test pilot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0051
rows.name: Give a thumbs-up with a smile, while hiding your fear.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0060
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0061
rows.name: Firmly refuse.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0024
rows.name:
Really!? There were lots of things
I wanted to try, but just having
Doug-san wasn't enough![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well then, I'll make a whole bunch,
so next time please stick with me for thorough testing!
I'm counting on you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0026
rows.name:
You look pale...
Are you feeling unwell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hmm. That's too bad, but
if that's the case, it can't be helped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0028
rows.name:
For the time being, I guess
I'll just have Doug-san keep trying his best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0029
rows.name:
Oops!
I completely forgot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0030
rows.name:
That's right! Because Doug-san's body
is so sturdy, we've been able to keep
testing this whole time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0031
rows.name:
The next flight test
looks like it'll be pretty intense, though...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0032
rows.name:
Doug-san will surely be okay, right!
I think I'll have him
try his very best![ST:wait ]
